CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Treatment Recommended stage positioned above or below the Diagnosis Confirmed stage?
SRP.A: The Treatment Recommended stage is positioned {below} the Diagnosis Confirmed stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Completed?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Completed is {421}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Initiated?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Initiated is {505}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnosis Confirmed is {2029}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Diagnosis Confirmed, with a value of {2029}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Completed, with a value of {421}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to stage Treatment Recommended?
SC.A: Decreased by {1015} Patients from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to stage Treatment Recommended.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated?
SC.A: Decreased by {509} Patients from stage Treatment Recommended to stage Treatment Initiated.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 463? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {2029}, the {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1014}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {505}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1521? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1014}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {505}, the {Treatment Completed} stage has {421}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 463 and 1521? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1014}, the {Treatment Initiated} stage has {505}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated, or from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Treatment Recommended} to {Treatment Initiated} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended, from stage Treatment Initiated to Treatment Completed, or from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnosis Confirmed} to stage {Treatment Recommended} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Diagnosis Confirmed} and {Treatment Recommended} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Initiated} and {Treatment Completed} stages.
